AuthErrors.invalidateSession: Your session has expired, please log in again

arm_modal.warning: Make sure that you are not going to damage the cameras at this time
arm_modal.info: The person arming the system is responsible for the damage to the equipment

carbon_dioxide_level.average: average CO2 level over the last 24 hours

data_transfer.average: average transfer usage from the last 24h
data_transfer.last: the last saved level of transfer consumption

safeway_battery.average: the average battery charge from the last 24h

tablet_battery.average: average battery level of the driver's tablet from the last 24h
tablet_battery.critical: critical level of tablet battery charge {{value}}{{unit}}

trailer_battery.average: average battery level of the truck battery from the last 24h
trailer_battery.critical: critical level of truck battery charge {{value}}{{unit}}

sensors.confirm_save: saving the changed settings will assign them to the sensor in the selected trailer.

temperature.critical_level: Set the hazard status at temperature
temperature.notifications: I would like to receive notifications if the temperature of the trailer drops to

monitoring.wait_thumbnails: Please select a visible image from the thumbnails or wait for images to load.
monitoring.select_visible: Please select a visible image from the thumbnails.

common.clear_search_description: some trailers have been hidden to view them click
common.media_unavailable: camera is offline <0/> Please make sure camera is ON and trailer is ONLINE
common.info_inactual: Info on sensors and engine may be IRRELEVANT
common.whatsnew_20200221: <0>Version 2020-02-21</0><1>UI Improvements</1><2><0>Trailer OFFLINE indicator is extended by an informative message</0><1>Map contains markers with time and speed of a trailer - appear when hovering over</1><2>If image or video from camera is unavailable, the eye icon turns to red with a message</2><3>Parking events are displayed on the Map (Parking icon)</3><4><0>Trailer is "parked" if engine is switched off.</0></4><5>Engine ON/OFF events are available on Events Pane, Events Detail Pane and Map.</5><6>Battery level indicator is calculated using physical discharge curve.</6><7>14-days recording history is made available.</7><8>Trailer reconnects regularly if looses network coverage.</8></2><3>Technical improvements</3><4><0>Invalid GPS points from the device are filtered to prevent route disturbance.</0><1>Regular reconnect is implemented if trailer goes out of network temporarily.</1><2>DB searches are optimised, cleanup procedure is implemented.</2></4>
common.whatsnew_20200202: <0>Version 2020-02-02</0><1>UI Improvements</1><2><0>"What's New" panel, that highlights all updates and fixes since last version</0><1>Now last time when the Panel has got an update from the trailer is displayed ("Last login")</1><2>Trailer engine ON/OFF indicator in Navigation Pane and in Details Pane.</2><3>Trailer ONLINE/OFFLINE indicator in Navigation Pane and in Details Pane.</3><4><0>Trailer is "online" if status update has come during last 30 seconds.</0></4><5>New Trailer events are available on Events Pane, Events Detail Pane and Map:<1><0>Truck disconnected from / connected to trailer</0><1>Truck battery is low / is Ok</1><2>System shutdown is approaching (5 min to shutdown)</2><3>System shutdown is in progress</3></1></5><6>GPS route is made much smoother and fault-proof:<1><0>GPS points are recorded every 2 seconds</0><1>GPS points are delivered to the server every 30 seconds</1><2>If the Trailer goes offline, GPS points are stacked on the device and delivered when network connects.</2></1></6><7>Fixed screen glitches (login screen error message, language resources)</7><8>h.264 parameters optimized for all cameras</8><9>All cameras are set up to use GPS time to synchronize the internal clock.</9></2><3>Technical improvements</3><4><0>Web Panel performance is optimised in production.</0><1>Resolved all code issues from RSpec, tests run without warnings.</1><2>DB structure and Backend performance is optimised</2></4>
